description: This header file declares functions and includes relevant headers related to generating and broadcasting property set/delete events within an internal system, specifically for propagating property change events to listeners such as services and clients.

methods.name: startPropsEventProducer
methods.description: Initializes the event producer system for broadcasting property events.

methods.name: stopPropsEventProducer
methods.description: Shuts down the event producer system.

methods.name: broadcastPropertyEvent
methods.description: Broadcasts a property change event (add/update/delete) to all registered listeners.
